dimensions: H x diam.: 8 x 11 cm (3 1/8 x 4 5/16 in.)
title: Bowl
description: The coil-built bowl rests upon a flat foot; the body tapers outward to an angled low shoulder and in at an angle toward the lip. The shoulder area is decorated with a running band of geometric motifs burnished against a matte ground. The lower body is entirely burnished as is the lip. On the underside is the signature "Tonita", applied with a burnishing tool.
name: Bowl
